item.title: Deploying a Static Website to S3 using GitHub Actions
item.description: To create a static website using Hugo, GitHub, GitHub Actions, and Amazon S3, follow these steps: Install Hugo: If you are using macOS or Linux, you can install Hugo using the following command: brew install hugo If you are using Windows, you can download the latest Hugo executable from the Hugo releases page and add it to your PATH. Create a new Hugo site: Navigate to the directory where you want to create your new Hugo site and run the following command: hugo new site mysite This will create a new Hugo site in a directory called mysite.
